card.name: Korvan Thresher
card.text: When this creature enters, sow. (To sow, mill two cards, then you may exile a permanent card from your graveyard to create a 1/1 green Plant creature token.) {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Production Overseer
card.text: Whenever you create one or more tokens, tap up to one target creature. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Planting Season
card.text: Sow twice. (To sow, mill two cards, then you may exile a permanent card from your graveyard to create a 1/1 green Plant creature token.) Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Scarlet Matron
card.text: Flying When this creature enters, each player creates a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Expansion Overseers
card.text: This creature enters with a +1/+1 counter on it if you've sacrificed one or more tokens this turn.

card.name: Wealdwitch Familiar
card.text: When this creature enters, put a flying counter on up to one target creature. When this card leaves your graveyard, put a flying counter on up to one target creature.

card.name: Korvan Enforcers
card.text: Reap {1}{U} (You may cast this spell for {1}{U} by also sacrificing two tokens or a nontoken creature.) When this creature enters, return up to one target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Wheat from Chaff
card.text: Choose one — • Draw two cards. • Sow. Put up to one card from among cards milled this way into your hand. (To sow, mill two cards, then you may exile a permanent card from your graveyard to create a 1/1 green Plant creature token.)

card.name: Cruor Harvester
card.text: When this creature enters, create a tapped Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") This creature can't attack unless you've discarded or milled one or more cards this turn.

card.name: Stitcher of the Strictures
card.text: Flash When this creature enters, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. If you owned the exiled card, draw a card.

card.name: Profane Offerings
card.text: Deathtouch When this creature dies, sow twice. (To sow, mill two cards, then you may exile a permanent card from your graveyard to create a 1/1 green Plant creature token.)

card.name: Veldstire Bloodrancher
card.text: When this creature enters, create a tapped Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") This creature gets +1/+0 and has lifelink as long as you've sacrificed one or more tokens this turn.

card.name: Poach
card.text: Reap {B} (You may cast this spell for {B} by also sacrificing two tokens or a nontoken creature.) Destroy target creature or enchantment you don't control. You lose 2 life unless this spell's reap cost was paid.

card.name: Lurking Fieldfiend
card.text: When this creature enters, put a menace counter on up to one target creature. When this card leaves your graveyard, put a menace counter on up to one target creature.

card.name: The Hands That Feed
card.text: Haste Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Vengeful Thatchlings
card.text: Reach When this creature enters, if it isn't a token, create a token that's a copy of it. When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Voracious Roggenwulf
card.text: Trample Whenever this creature attacks, create a tapped Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Red Harvest
card.text: Reap {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for {1}{R} by also sacrificing two tokens or a nontoken creature.) Red Harvest deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Feldgast's Counsel
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell from anywhere other than your graveyard, discard a card. Draw two cards. Flashback {3}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Living Almanac
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if you've discarded or milled one or more cards this turn. Flying

card.name: Fangweed
card.text: When this creature dies, if it isn't a token, create a token that's a copy of it. That token enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Threadbreaker Magus
card.text: When this creature enters, you may pay {1}{GW}. If you do, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Flockfeaster
card.text: Reap {4}{G} (You may cast this spell for {4}{G} by also sacrificing two tokens or a nontoken creature.) Trample

card.name: Uprooter's Blessing
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Weald's Edge Herald
card.text: Vigilance When this creature enters, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Iron Ox
card.text: Trample Sacrifice three tokens: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Servile Thatchling
card.text: Reach {1} , {T}: Add one mana of any color. When this creature dies, draw a card.

card.name: Shadowmaidens
card.text: Menace When this creature enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, create a tapped Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Offalings
card.text: Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. {3}{UB}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Draw a card.

card.name: Crone of Thorns
card.text: Reap {R}{G} (You may cast this spell for {R}{G} by also sacrificing two tokens or a nontoken creature.) Whenever this creature or another creature you control dies, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Fieldpyre
card.text: Trample Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) Whenever you discard or mill one or more cards, up to one target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: The Day's Labors
card.text: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1. {2}{G}{W}: Sow. Activate only as a sorcery. (To sow, mill two cards, then you may exile a permanent card from your graveyard to create a 1/1 green Plant creature token.)

card.name: Sic
card.text: Choose one — • Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. • Exile target creature.

card.name: Unravel
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if you've discarded or milled one or more cards this turn. Counter target spell.

card.name: Famineflight Feldgast
card.text: Reap {4}{B} (You may cast this spell for {4}{B} by also sacrificing two tokens or a nontoken creature.) Flying This creature enters with a +1/+1 counter on it for each permanent you sacrificed to cast it.

card.name: Unassuming Servant
card.text: {UR}: Switch this creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Favor of the Weald
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Untap each token you control.

card.name: Mobile Home
card.text: Haste Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Indentured Fieldguard
card.text: You may have this creature enter with a defender counter on it. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Harbinger of the Harvest
card.text: Reap {2}{W}{B} (You may cast this spell for {2}{W}{B} by also sacrificing two tokens or a nontoken creature.) {WB}{WB}, Sacrifice two tokens: This creature gains your choice of flying, vigilance, or indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Shadowstitch
card.text: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. It enters with a deathtouch counter on it. Flashback—{UB}{UB}{UB}, Sacrifice three nonland permanents. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Springsturmer
card.text: Trample Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, sow up to that many times. You may play cards exiled this way until end of turn. (To sow, mill two cards, then you may exile a permanent card from your graveyard to create a 1/1 green Plant creature token.)

card.name: Dragon's Revelation
card.text: Draw X cards. This spell deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Green Thumbling
card.text: Lifelink {3}{GW}{GW}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped with a finality counter on it, then create two tapped tokens that are copies of it. (If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)

card.name: Whik, First of the Thatched
card.text: Flash Vigilance Other Scarecrows you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.
